description.value: Collects test data from Dynatrace Synthetic.

property.label: User Name
property.description: A Dynatrace Synthetic user with at least account primary, account admin or operator advanced role assigned.

property.label: Password
property.description: The password for the user listed above.

property.label: Test Name
property.description: The full, friendly name assigned to the test you're interested in.

property.label: Test Type
property.description: The type of test listed above.

property.label: Proxy
property.description: If enabled, the configured HTTP proxy server will be used. If you enable this option, run the plugin on a dedicated collector.

property.label: Proxy host
property.description: The hostname of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy port
property.description: The port of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy password
property.description: The password for the proxy username.

metric.name: responseTime
metric.description: The average response time since the last poll split by location. Please note that the average reported here combined might not exactly match what's being reported in the portal.

metric.name: availability
metric.description: The availability reported since the last poll split by location. Availability is calculated with the assumption a failed step equals a failed test run.

metric.name: successfulSteps
metric.description: The number of successful steps since the last poll split by location.

metric.name: failedSteps
metric.description: The number of failed steps since the last poll split by location.

metric.name: successObjects
metric.description: The number of successful objects since the last poll split by location.

metric.name: failedObjects
metric.description: The number of failed objects since the last poll split by location.

metric.name: averageNumberOfBytes
metric.description: The average number of bytes downloaded since the last poll split by location.

metric.name: testExecutions
metric.description: The number of tests executed since the last poll split by location. This number will only be accurate if you poll at least once a day.
